00022 typedef unsigned short cccUCS2; 
00023 typedef unsigned char  cccCode;
00024 
00025 /* supported codepages */
00026 #define CCC_CP000  0x00 //ASCII
00027 #define CCC_CP437  0x01 //US
00028 #define CCC_CP850  0x05 //Multilingual Latin I
00029 #define CCC_CP866  0x0b //Russian
00030 #define CCC_CP932  0x0d //S-JIS
00031 #define CCC_CP936  0x0e //GBK
00032 #define CCC_CP949  0x0f //Korean
00033 #define CCC_CP950  0x10 //Big5
00034 #define CCC_CP1251 0x12 //Cyrillic
00035 #define CCC_CP1252 0x13 //Latin II
00036 #define CCC_CPUTF8 0xff //UTF-8
00037 #define CCC_N_CP   0x14 //number of codepages (for array definition)
00038 
00039 /* error codes */
00040 #define CCC_SUCCESS             0x00000000
00041 #define CCC_ERROR_BUFFER_SIZE   0x80000104
00042 #define CCC_ERROR_INPUT_STREAM  0x80000108
00043 #define CCC_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC     0x800200D9
00044 #define CCC_ERROR_FILE_READ     0x80020130
00045 #define CCC_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED   0x80020325
00046 
00047 
00057 int cccStrlen(cccCode const * str);                 //for single byte character sets

00059 int cccStrlenGBK(cccCode const * str);
00060 int cccStrlenKOR(cccCode const * str);
00061 int cccStrlenBIG5(cccCode const * str);
00062 int cccStrlenUTF8(cccCode const * str);
00063 int cccStrlenCode(cccCode const * str, unsigned char cp);
00064 int cccStrlenUCS2(cccUCS2 const * str);

00083 int cccUTF8toUCS2(cccUCS2 * dst, size_t count, cccCode const * str);
00084 int cccCodetoUCS2(cccUCS2 * dst, size_t count, cccCode const * str, unsigned char cp);
